page.title: 09Employment
page.content: My Dad works for the J.E.C, which means Jersey Electric Company. It is a big firm that employs hundreds of people. There is a large shop in St. Helier that sells electrical goods and people pay their bills there. My Dad works in an Office at Queen's Road. It is inside the central stores. He is in charge of deliveries and gives the van drivers their jobs. He likes his work, but is very busy, especially when they have the sales. He works on a computer and puts in information. He is in charge of 14 men and has a boss called Tony who runs the stores. He has worked at the J.E.C. for 14 yars. He gets good holidays and has the first Monday off every month. My Dad doesn't do overtime unless he has to. He starts work at 8.00 a.m. and finishes at 5.00 p.m.
